comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The middle initial looks like "H" to me. I think this is en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Haven_Putnam "George Haven Putnam A.M., Litt.D. (April 2, 1844 – February 27, 1930) was an American soldier, publisher, and author. "

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq:  Thanks for the correction on the middle initial, and for Putnam's full name.  We will add your information next time we update.
